Package com.uno.database

Class DatabaseImpl

java.lang.Object
com.uno.database.DatabaseImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
Database
public class DatabaseImpl extends Object implements Database
A class that implements Database interface. The class handles sending the objects from database to the server or back.
